Services

Class OperationsService

  • java.lang.Object
    • Services.OperationsService

  • public class OperationsService
extends java.lang.Object
    The service class to perform CRUD functions for Operations

      • get

        public Operations get(int operationId)
        Retrieves an operation from the DB using the ID

        operationId - the operation to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        A Operations Object

      • getAll

        public java.util.List<Operations> getAll()
        Returns all operations in the DB
        Returns:
        A list of all Operations Objects.

      • insert

        public void insert(int operationId,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String longText,
                   int work_order_id,
                   int status,
                   int person_responsible)
        Creates a new Operations Object and inserts it into the DB
        Parameters:
        operationId - the new Operations Unique identifier
        description - What the operation is
        longText - Any comments made on it
        work_order_id - Which work order it is for
        status - what the current status is. (See top of file for codes)
        person_responsible - Who is doing the operation

      • delete

        public void delete(int operationId)
        Remove an operation from the DB
        Parameters:
        operationId - Which operation to remove

      • update

        public void update(int operationId,
                   java.lang.String description,
                   java.lang.String longText,
                   int work_order_id,
                   int status,
                   int person_responsible)
        Update an operation in the DB
        Parameters:
        operationId - The operation to update
        description - The new description
        longText - The new Comment
        work_order_id - the new work order
        status - The new Status(See top of file for codes)
        person_responsible - The new person responsible

      • insert

        public void insert(Operations o)
        Insert an operation into the db using an already created one.
        Parameters:
        o - The new object to insert
